segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water overflowing and flooding the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is getting wet, but she just keeps polishing that dish like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just too focused or if she’s ignoring the mess on purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it’s going to be a disaster if someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are up to no good, but she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to regret not paying attention soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
